title: Analysis of Factors Affecting Student Performance in Blended Learning Environments and Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen blended class design and operational competencies in social studies education for university students

learning_goals: Learners can statistically analyze the correlation between student engagement and academic performance in hybrid classes.
Learners can evaluate the impact of online learning elements (e.g., video lectures, quizzes) on student achievement.
Learners can design effective performance-improvement strategies integrating in-person instruction with online learning activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
